Caldwell.Caldwell Odd Fellow Home for the Aged: The Caldwell Odd Fellow Home for the Aged in Caldwell, Idaho was built in 1920. It was designed by Tourtellotte & Hummel and built by C. E. Silbaugh with aspects of Late 19th and 20th Century Revivals architecture and Second Renaissance Revival architecture. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1982.
